name: Vullaby

evolution.description: Vullaby can evolve into Mandibuzz at level 13 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 12 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Diapered Pokémon. They tend to guard their posteriors with suitable bones they have found. They pursue weak Pokémon.

abilities.name: Big Pecks
abilities.description: This Pokémon's AC cannot be reduced by an opponent's moves.

abilities.name: Overcoat
abilities.description: This Pokémon does not take damage from weather-related moves and phenomena like Hail, Weather Ball, etc.

abilities.name: Weak Armor
abilities.description: When an attack hits this Pokémon, its speed increases by 5 feet, but its AC is temporarily reduced by 1 until the end of battle (for a maximum reduction of -5).
